alert.note: Alert for Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:44AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wilkinson County through 330 AM CDT... At 244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingston, or 12 miles southeast of Natchez, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Dolorosa and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
